titles.title: MP279 I know not why God's wondrous Grace

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know not why God's wondrous grace
to me has been made known;
nor why-unworthy as I am-
He claimed me for his own.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know not how this saving faith
to me He did impart;
or how believing in His word
wrought peace upon my heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know not how the Spirit moves,
convincing men of sin;
revealing Jesus through the word,
creating faith in him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I know not what of good or ill
may be reserved for me
of weary ways or golden days
before His face I see.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
But," I know whom I have believed;
and am persuaded that He is able
to keep
that which I've commited
unto Him against that day.
